characters.name: Makoto Naegi
alt_names: Super High School Level Good Luck (超高校級の幸運)
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160 cm (5'3")
__Talent:__ Ultimate Lucky Student

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Naegi is friendly and a lot more down-to-earth than other students. He tends to act passively in conversation. According to him, his most distinguishing feature is his optimism.

characters.name: Sayaka Maizono
characters.description:
__Height:__ 165 cm (5'5")
__Talent:__ Ultimate Pop Sensation

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Sayaka is the lead singer of an incredibly popular idol group. She and Naegi were classmates in middle school. Sayaka once saw Naegi saving a crane stuck in the school pool, and since that has wanted to talk with Naegi.

characters.name: Kyouko Kirigiri
characters.description:
__Height:__ 167 cm (5'5")
__Talent:__ Ultimate ???

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Kyouko is a mysterious, stoic, and independent person who deliberately masks her feelings so that others won't be able to read her. Because of this, she has a cold demeanor and appears to remain calm and collected in most situations. Despite this, however, she can sometimes let her emotions get the best of her when she's especially upset. Though aloof and slow to trust others, Kyouko is adept at noticing things that the other students don't, which proves vital once bodies start turning up. She often advises Makoto on conducting investigations.

~!Her actual talent is the Ultimate Detective.!~

characters.name: Monokuma
characters.description:
__Height:__ 75cm / 2'6" (DR1 & DRV3), 65cm / 2'2" (DR2)
__Gender:__ None (DR1), Male (DR2 & DRV3)

A stuffed robotic bear and the self-proclaimed Headmaster of Hope's Peak Academy who instigates the various killing games in the Danganronpa series. Monokuma is often described as easygoing and cheerful at first glance, but with a very sinister undertone.. He loves hysteria, violence, chaos, and most of all, despair.

characters.name: Celestia Ludenberg
alt_names: セレスティア・ルーデンベルク
超高校級のギャンブラー
characters.description:
__Height:__ 164 cm (5'5")
__Talent:__ Ultimate Gambler

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Also known as the "Queen of Liars", Celestia is renowned for her exemplary luck in games of chance. She's accumulated a sizable fortune by robbing anyone stupid enough to challenge her blind. She speaks softly and smiles often, but in a way that tends to creep out everyone around her. She also hides a surprisingly short temper and will start shouting (usually at Hifumi) if she isn't pleased.  

~!Her true name is Taeko Yasuhiro.!~

characters.name: Aoi Asahina
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160 cm (5'3")
__Talent:__ Ultimate Swimming Pro

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Always energetic and friendly, Asahina is also a bit airheaded. She has difficulty remembering names.

characters.name: Yasuhiro Hagakure
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm (5'11")

A student of Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Yasuhiro is one of the more cheery, laid-back students, though a bit odd as well. However, he is generally not well-liked and he himself has openly admitted that he has no friends, being quite cowardly, lazy, slow-witted, and having a habit to act selfishly. Notably, he is mentioned to be very clumsy with money and he has constant problems with massive debts.

He's also quite gullible, and at first acts laid-back about the killing game, thinking it's some sort of a prank. However, after realizing it is real, he turns much more panicky and he is generally considered useless by the other students. However, he does treat his fellow classmates with general friendliness, going so far as to add the suffix "-chi", an affectionate term for dear friends in Japanese, to the end of everyone's last name (except for Sakura Ogami, whom he is afraid of and just calls with the insulting nickname "Ogre").

(Source: Danganronpa Wiki)

characters.name: Hifumi Yamada
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm 
__Talent:__ Ultimate Fanfic Creator

Yamada comes across as creepy and perverted, possibly due to his tendency to make an innuendo over some things that other students said; a trait that creeps Leon out. He also has a habit of referencing a lot of anime or video games in his speech. He loves Buko, the female lead in his favorite anime series, Heretic Angel ☆ Mochi Mochi Princess. He has a particular dislike toward people who supposedly don’t understand the true meaning of doujin, even going as far to claim that they’re ruining everything. His dream is to ‘save’ other people by making a doujin that will inspire them to create their own.

characters.name: Leon Kuwata
alt_names: Super High School Level Baseball Player
characters.description:
__Height:__ 175cm / 5'9"
__Talent:__ Ultimate Baseball Star

A student of Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Leon is a passionate, hot-blooded young man. He often slacks off from studying and baseball training. However, he never encountered any problem with his attitude due to his status as Super High-School Level Baseball Player. Leon is also very determined to change his current title to ‘Super High-School Level Musician' to win a heart of a girl that he happened to meet at the hair salon. Later, Leon himself states that he somewhat missed playing baseball; something that he used to do every time since he was young. He even invites Naegi to play baseball with him once they get out of their current situation.

characters.name: Mondo Oowada
alt_names: Super High School Level Gang Leader
characters.description:
__Height:__ 187 cm (6'2")
__Talent:__ Ultimate Biker Gang Leader

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Mondo is the second leader of the Crazy Diamonds, Japans largest and most feared biker gang. He has ​high respect for his brother from whom he inherited the gang from after he died. He acts tough and has a strong sense of honor and loyalty to his companions. He yells when he gets nervous which causes him to have trouble confessing to girls and he loves dogs. After he finishes his role as a gang member he wants to become a carpenter.

characters.name: Byakuya Togami
characters.description:
__Height:__ 185 cm (6'1")
__Talent:__ Ultimate Affluent Progeny

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Byakuya is arrogant, seeing himself superior to his peers due to having fought to become the heir to his family's massive financial conglomerate. However, he is a sensible student who holds a truthful, albeit cynical, outlook on the world. He is ruthlessly honest about his opinions and often hurts others with his blunt remarks. Despite his negative attitude, he does occasionally lend a hand to other characters.

characters.name: Touko Fukawa
alt_names: Ultimate Writing Prodigy (超高校級の文学少女)
Super High School Level Literary Girl
characters.description:
__Height:__ 165 cm  (5'5")
__Talent:__ Ultimate Writing Prodigy

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Due to her severe persecution complex that originates from the bullying she suffered at a young age, Touko is highly suspicious of other people, frequently accusing them of thinking bad things about her. She has also caused others to give a bad first impression of her as she is known to blatantly insult others, even though it is the very first time they have met. Despite her young age, she has already won several awards for her writing, and her works are constantly on top of selling lists. She is also in love with Byakuya Togami, constantly swooning over him and acting extremely submissive towards him, although her affection is one-sided.

 ~!Touko actually has two different identities, the other being Genocider Sho. !~

characters.name: Kiyotaka Ishimaru
alt_names: Super High School Level Public Morals (超高校級の風紀委員)
characters.description:
__Height:__ 176 cm (5'9")
__Talent:__ Ultimate Moral Compass

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Befitting of a Super High School Level Hall Monitor, Ishimaru is righteous and values order above all else. He is also a hard worker, believing that one can achieve anything through hard work. In fact, he earned his title by the same means too. Due to his extreme dedication to studying and proper conduct, he has difficulties in making friends and could not even hold a ‘normal’ conversation with another person. Ishimaru is very expressive and intense in his manner of speech.

characters.name: Chihiro Fujisaki
alt_names: Super High School Level Programmer (超高校級のプログラマー)
characters.description:
~!__Gender__: Male!~
__Height:__ 148 cm (4'9")
__Talent:__ Ultimate Programmer

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Chihiro is a computer genius behind numerous innovative software. Has a very timid, meek personality, crying easily and apologizing often. However, Chihiro loves to talk about programming and becomes much livelier when it's brought up. 

As a kid, Chihiro spent most of the time on the computer. Chihiro's father, Taichi Fujisaki, was a software engineer who developed many major computer programs. While using his computer one day, Chihiro ended up modifying one of Taichi's incomplete programs and soon realized that she could write programs, after that, Chihiro became absorbed in programming and became famous for creating cutting-edge programs, including top-secret AI programs for an unnamed company, and gained many fans for resembling a "timid little bunny".

characters.name: Sakura Oogami
alt_names: Super High School Level Fighter ( 超高校級の格闘家)
characters.description:
__Height:__ 192 cm / 6'4"
__Talent:__ Ultimate Martial Artist

A student in Hope's Peak Academy's Class 78th, and a participant of the Killing School Life. 

Contrary to what her appearance might suggest, Sakura is a quiet, kind, and level-headed girl. She rarely loses her nerve and seems able to maintain clarity in any situation. At times she can grow slightly annoyed and upset, like when people assume things like she isn't a good cook due to her looks. During more rare moments, she can lose her temper completely and become extremely intense, particularly when her friends get hurt. She also gets impatient if she cannot properly train for a long period of time. She is known for her love of protein and protein coffee and enjoying exercising early in the morning before a large breakfast.

Due to her more old-fashioned upbringing, Sakura has a habit of talking in an old-fashioned, formal manner. Being raised as the sole heir to a dojo with a three-hundred-year history, she believes that being a martial artist is simply her destiny. Along with learning martial arts, she learned to respect nature and animals, being particularly fond of rabbits as they never seem to get frightened when she holds them.

Along with protecting her legacy as her sworn duty, Sakura wants to prove that a woman can be the Strongest Person Alive. She also believes that she must work harder than men to achieve this goal. As a result of striving to be strong, Sakura is embarrassed about her own softer feelings and being feminine, assuming that other people would laugh at her if they knew.
